products.name: Revolving Centres
products.description: Precision-engineered revolving centres designed for optimal workpiece support in turning operations. Our comprehensive range includes solutions for everything from standard machining to high-speed CNC applications.

products.name: Tube Centres
products.description: Available in Blunt Type (35-125mm, 75-150mm, 100-200mm, 100-230mm) and Pointed Type (0-3", 0-4", 0-5"). Tapers available: 3MT, 4MT, 5MT, 6MT.

products.name: Drill Sleeves and Extension Sockets
products.description: Extension Sleeves range from 1MT x 2MT to 6MT x 7MT. Drill Sleeves range from 7MT X 6MT to 2MT x 1MT. All products are hardened and ground.

product_features: All products are hardened and ground

products.name: Lathe Chucks
products.description: Size range: 65mm up to 630mm. Available in 3 jaw self centring, 4 jaw self centring, 3 jaw independent, and 4 jaw independent types. Mounting options include plain back, front mounting, and camlock (D1). Accessories available: hard jaws, soft jaws, and chuck spares.

products.name: Back End Tooling
products.description: Available in tapers BT 50, BT 40, ISO 50, ISO 40, DIN 50, DIN 40, R 8, and MT. Holder types include Collect Chucks, Extended Collet Chucks, Side Locks, Stub Arbors, MT Adaptors, Boring Heads, and Autolock chucks.

products.name: Taper Shank Drills
products.description: Available in sizes ranging from 6mm up to 85mm.

products.name: Machine Vices
products.description: Jaw width range: 75mm up to 200mm. Available types include Plain base, Swivel base, Tilting, Three way universal, and CNC modular machine vices.
